data.title: Priming Centrifugal Pedestal Pump
meta_keywords: aviation equipment AMT 2760-99 Self-Priming Centrifugal Pedestal Pump
data.meta_description: AMT self-priming centrifugal pedestal pump, 2 inch NPT inlet/outlet, cast iron. AMT Self-Priming Centrifugal Pedestal pumps are designed for a wide range of industrial, agricultural and commercial applications. Heavy duty cast iron construction.
data.text:
AMT Pumps - 2760-99 - Self-Priming Centrifugal Pedestal Pump

AMT Self-Priming Centrifugal Pedestal pumps are designed for a wide range of industrial, agricultural and commercial applications. Heavy duty cast iron construction. Pumps are fitted with a self-cleaning, semi-open impeller and are coupled to a heavy duty cast iron bearing housing with a CNC machined keyed shaft extension and sealed ball bearings. The pump has been designed for either direct connection or belt drive. The maximum recommended RPM is 4000.

AMT Self-Priming Centrifugal Pedestal pumps are reliable, cost effective and low maintenance. For use with non-flammable liquids which are compatible with pump component materials.

Cast Iron Construction

Mechanical Seals: Buna-N

Maximum temperature Buna-N 180Â°F

Maximum working pressure 75 PSI

Maximum 4000 RPM

Built in check valve

Solids-Handling to 3/8 in. Diameter

Self priming up to 20 ft. @ 3450 RPM

Dual volute design reduces radial load on motor

Optional silicon carbide mechanical seal available

Stop! Required before ordering:
